songs.title: Every Time
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Every single time I'm bringing pressure boy, you know what's up
Fuck the two door Audi, I just went and copped a Beamer truck
Hit lil mama then I quit lil mama boy, you know she [?]
Stop it, you don't really love a nigga girl, it's just the lust
Since she wanna be childish I just took her ass to Toys-R-Us
You niggas just be rappin', I just spit what's really happenin'
I'm snappin' and I'm trappin' and I'm jackin' and I'm traffickin'
Ugh, actuality, all my shit be accurate
That's why they fuck with me, it's deeper than this rappin' shit
When you listen to me, you can just imagine this
It's a Kodak moment, Lord don't let them capture me
